pageContext.description: A raised oval dome on each side, and near this a hole. The edges of holes are bevelled on the inside of socket. On one side are incised characters just below socket rim.
pageContext.patina: Thick Patina smooth dark green. Appears to have been filed away at edge, where golden bronze shows.
pageContext.other: Site: unspecified location possibly in Northern India and Tibet - geolocation not accurate to 10 kms,Width: edge 45mm; socket 48.5mm,Thickness: socket 28mm,Weight: 418.14 gms
pageContext.collection: Private Collection,1923,Lord Howard de Walden,Belgrave Square, SW
pageContext.site: said to have come from north india or tibet
